Trade/Device Name(s): Copan Liquid Amies Elution Swab (ESwab) Collection and Transport System
Regulation Name(s): Microbiological specimen collection and transport device
Specimen Container(s): Plastic screw-cap tube with conical shaped bottom
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Copan Liquid Amies Elution Swab (ESwab) Collection and Transport System for collection and transport of clinical specimens containing bacteria.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for collection and transport of clinical specimens containing aerobes, anaerobes, and fastidious bacteria from collection site to testing laboratory for bacterial culture.
